verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H8469>supplications:<s%> in your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> me, and in your <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
And <S%H935>enter<s%> not into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant:<s%> for in your <S%H6440>sight<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> man <S%H2416>living<s%> be <S%H6663>justified.<s%>

For the <S%H341>enemy<s%> has <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> he has <S%H1792>smitten<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> down to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> he has made me to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H4285>darkness,<s%> as those that have been <S%H5769>long<s%> <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
Therefore is my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me; my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> me is <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>

I <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old;<s%> I <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6467>works;<s%> I <S%H7878>muse<s%> on the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
I <S%H6566>stretch<s%> forth my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to you: my <S%H5315>soul<s%> thirsts after you, as a thirsty <S%H776>land.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H6030>Hear<s%> me <S%H4118>speedily,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3615>fails:<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> not your <S%H6440>face<s%> from me, lest I be <S%H4911>like<s%> to them that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

Cause me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> for in you do I <S%H982>trust:<s%> cause me to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2098>wherein<s%> I should <S%H3212>walk;<s%> for I <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H5315>soul<s%> to you.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> from my <S%H341>enemies:<s%> I <S%H3680>flee<s%> to you to <S%H3680>hide<s%> me.

<S%H3925>Teach<s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> your <S%H7522>will;<s%> for you are my <S%H430>God:<s%> your <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> me into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4334>uprightness.<s%>
<S%H2421>Quicken<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> for your <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake: for your <S%H6666>righteousness'<s%> sake <S%H3318>bring<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

And of your <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H6789>cut<s%> off my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H6887>afflict<s%> my <S%H5315>soul:<s%> for I am your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
